name: Drunk (milenacorrea)
description:
Your name is Nox.

You are getting kicked out of the bar again.

It's the 3rd time this week.

Find your way back home, or wander around a seemingly desolate town...

HOW TO PLAY:

- Move LEFT with "A" and RIGHT with "D"

- Press "W" to INTERACT with things

- Use the MOUSE to proceed with DIALOGUE

FEATURES: 

- 5 Different Endings based on interactions

- Dialogue/Player choice save variables 

- Hand-drawn assets, animations, and  backgrounds done in Procreate

- Scripted using Fungus for Unity
